name: courier-management-system
description: Courier Management System built with MERN Stack

scripts.start-clean: npm run kill-ports && npm run start-all
scripts.client-no-browser: cd frontend && cross-env BROWSER=none npm start
scripts.install-all: npm run install-server && npm run install-client
scripts.start: echo 'ðŸš€ Starting CMS Application...' && npm run start:frontend & npm run start:backend
scripts.optimize: npm run init-db && echo Optimization complete! Your CMS is now optimized for performance and security.
scripts.setup: npm run install-all && npm run init-db && echo Setup complete! Run 'npm run dev' to start the application.
scripts.production-build: npm run install-all && cd frontend && npm run build
scripts.test-system: npm run check-db && curl -s http://localhost:5000/api/health || echo 'System check complete'
